hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Abdullah:that his father had written to Ibn Al-Arqam a letter asking him to ask Subai'a Al-Aslamiya how the Prophet had given her the verdict. She said, "The Prophet, gave me his verdict that after I gave birth, I could marry

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ: {وَأُولاَتُ الأَحْمَالِ أَجَلُهُنَّ أَنْ يَضَعْنَ حَمْلَهُنَّ}
chapter.eng-name: "For those who are pregnant, their 'Idda is until they laydown their burdens."
